story: As you move through the underground lair, a group of mechanized drones suddenly swarm around you. What do you do?

actions.action: Engage in combat with the drones
actions.good: Your quick reflexes and tactical skills allow you to take down the drones, earning you a cache of valuable parts and components. Your combat prowess wins you the spoils.
actions.bad: Your attempts to destroy the drones result in them retaliating with greater force. Taking heavy damage, you narrowly avoid defeat, but fail to obtain any loot.

actions.action: Evade the drones and continue your mission
actions.good: With incredible agility, you dodge past the drones unscathed, bypassing them entirely. Your stealth pays off as you locate a secret stash of valuable items.
actions.bad: Trying to sneak past the drones without engaging in combat proves challenging. One drone catches sight of you, and you take damage before managing to escape. You are unable to obtain any loot.

actions.good: Using your tech skills, you successfully breach the drones' communication array, deactivating them entirely. Your knowledge of technology earns you a treasure trove of valuable equipment.
actions.bad: As you attempt to hack into the drones' systems, they retaliate with lethal force. Taking heavy damage, you narrowly survive but fail to obtain any loot.
